To enable playback, you need to download Selenium webdriver.
1. Go to http://docs.seleniumhq.org/download/
2. Click "Previous Releases" in the top left corner
3. Click "3.13".
4. Download "selenium-dotnet-strongnamed-3.13.1.zip"
5. Open downloaded archive and navigate to "Selenium.WebDriver.StrongNamed.3.13.1.nupkg\lib"
6. Move the contents to "C:\Program Files (x86)\Regression Suite Automation Tool\Common\External\Selenium"
7. Go back in the browser and open 3.4 folder

To support playback in IE browser:
7. Download "IEDriverServer_x64_3.4.0.zip"

To support playback in Google Chrome browser:
7.1. Go to https://sites.google.com/a/chromium.org/chromedriver/downloads
7.2. Go to the link opposite "Latest release:"
7.3. Download "chromedriver_win32.zip"

8. Unzip the downloaded file and move the contents to "C:\Program Files (x86)\Regression Suite Automation Tool\Common\External\Selenium"
